segments.text: I really love this kind of atmosphere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: An impressive officer is vital to the image projected by the company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are people everywhere.What ' s that girl doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She is dealing with customers and driving up new business . The guy next to her is in charge of their office computer network .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what about that man there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see you have a coffee bar for a water cooler . The staff here must be comfortable . I think it really helps morale when people feel supported by their employers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Indeed , they are . Keeping staff happy is the only way to keep them with the company .
segments.speaker: S1
